name: Ill Fated Quest
description:
Game where you were given a group of adventurers to battle the Dark Lord! While you can choose who among the adventurers will act, their action are out of your control so is the path to the Dark Lord.

Fonts: https://twitter.com/castpixel?s=20

Music: Fesliyan Studios music https://www.fesliyanstudios.com
